noun.description: The quality or state of giving out or reflecting light.
examples: we can change the brightness of the bulb

noun.description: The quality of being intelligent and quick-witted.
examples: he reminded me of my first son with his brightness and inquisitiveness

noun.description: The quality of being cheerful or lively.
examples: there's so much light and brightness in their faces

noun.description: The quality in sound of being clear, vibrant, and typically high-pitched.
examples: tone alters the brightness of the sound
